mng: cave, cavity, hole, acupuncture point, Taiwan pr. [xue4]

exm.mng: temple (on the sides of human head)
to hit a pressure point (martial arts), dim mak, see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]
(of itinerant entertainers) to tour, playing in many venues
lethal point (acupuncture), vulnerable spot, Achilles' heel
lit. wind from an empty cave (idiom), fig. unfounded (story), baseless (claim)
Wuxue county level city in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
